title: How does ranked season rewards work?
body: If I was Gold II and drop to Silver I by the end of the season would I get the Gold Rewards? or would I get the silver?

replies.body:
it goes by your rank when the season ends on the dot.

if you're gold, you get rewards, if not... then no.

ALSO, you need to be honor level 2 or higher.

> [{quoted}](name=simply bad,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=OA8anbEB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-09-26T12:25:35.284+0000)
>
> it goes by your rank when the season ends on the dot.
> 
> if you're gold, you get rewards, if not... then no.
> 
> ALSO, you need to be honor level 2 or higher.

I read conflicting answers here. Some say "highest achieved rank" and some say "ending rank." :(

> [{quoted}](name=whizkid75,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=OA8anbEB,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2018-10-20T15:04:40.452+0000)
>
> I read conflicting answers here. Some say "highest achieved rank" and some say "ending rank." :(

It's ending rank, don't listen to anyone who says highest rank achieved.
